question: Is it prohibited to have sexual intercourse on the day of Eid etc?
answer:
QUESTION

I want to know if there is any bar from having intercourse with my wife in the day of Eid, Shabbe Baraat and Shabbe Qadar.

ANSWER


Share:

In the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

As-salāmu ‘alaykum wa-rahmatullāhi wa-barakātuh.


It is permissible for a couple to have sexual intercourse on the days of Eid, shabbe qadar and shabbe barā’at unless the woman is on her period or experiencing lochia (post-natal bleeding- nifās)[1].

And Allah Ta’āla Knows Best 

Checked and Approved by,
Mufti Husain Kadodia

_____

[1] قَوْلِهِ تَعَالَى: وَلَا تَقْرَبُوهُنَّ حَتَّى يَطْهُرْنَ 

  [البقرة: ٢٢٢]
